title: Tiny Halu izakaya beckons on SF's Clement Street.
description: Shig Komiyama and his wife, Mimi, opened Halu to share the yakitori recipes and izakaya-style dishes that they missed so dearly from Japan.
seo_title: Tiny Halu izakaya beckons of San Francisco's Clement Street
author: Alison Christiana
twitter_text: Tiny Halu izakaya beckons on SF's Clement Street.
